article_title: Gaza war a marathon not a sprint, says adviser to Netanyahu.
sentence: Speaking  to  Sky  News,  Regev  said  when  he  visited  the  parents  and  families  of  Israeli  soldiers  who  died  fighting  in  Gaza,  the  families  told  him  "we  don’t  want  our  young  boys  to  have  died  in  vain.
